short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that turns workflows into GPAL code, generates the best browser selectors and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ottomatic, simply the best browser extension for developing automated workflows.

Also, creating browser automation selectors has never been easier, right click and select Copy Selector and get all the information you could want, multiple xpaths (and matches), css, text, bounding rectangles, image data  of the element (base64) and more.
Built to create GPAL workflows, but incredibly useful for generating selectors.

Guaranteed the best selectors of any extension!

GPAL REST API native app not included with extension. Used for communications with desktop GPAL Studio.
